name: Truth of our own
description:
Truth of our own is a competitive 2D multiplayer game.
Play for the Good Potato or the Evil Potato, use information to affect other fellow Potatoes. Affected Potatoes are joining your worldview and earning you points. When your side bar is filled, you win!
Compete with your friends, and be the most powerful Potato!

Music: Empty House by Mana Junkie (c) copyright 2020 Licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution Noncommercial  (3.0) license. http://dig.ccmixter.org/files/mana_junkie/62219 Ft: SiobhanD
